title: Suggestion: support push data into Orbit
body:
[Oribit](https://orbit.love/) is a powerful community-building platform, it would be wonderful if we could push the member activities into Orbit.

See also the [developer guide](https://orbit.love/developers) from the Orbit.

title: NA
body:
We just updated the docker image. If you are using docker-compose to install, please recreate a new folder and `docker-compose.yaml` to re-install. Please, execute the command `docker-compose pull` to re-pull the image and try to use it again. If you use binary to start, please recompile and start again.

If you still have error, please feel free to reply. Please provide your usage(docker or binary) and database(mysql or PostgreSQL) environment so that we can quickly locate the problem.

感谢回复。
请问使用的数据库是什么？mysql 吗？版本是多少？
- 由于看到您使用最新的镜像重新启动之后报错信息有改变，证明之前的镜像版本还比较旧，可能初始化的数据库并非最新的。旧的数据库可能存在问题，可以尝试将数据库删除后重新进行启动项目进行初始化。
- 也可能是由于使用的数据库不同导致，请提供一下具体版本，方便我们跟进测试排查

MySQL 8.0.31 

drop 数据库后 delete pod , 触发重新初始化,现在注册正常了.

title: NA
body:
找到bug的原因了，但是不确定应该如何修复。

在执行docker-compose up之后，会生成一个answer目录。等到再执行docker build时，就会产生文件名冲突。

建议docker-compose运行时，生成另一个名字的目录。比如：answer-data之类。

title: 🚩开一个 Answer 社区全数字化运营的讨论贴
body:
就像 @LinuxSuRen 在前面的 [Issue ](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/issues/3)中所提到的那样，可以考虑用一些数字化的工具来做一些社区运营的工作，特别是对于一个新项目来说，可以做各种尝试。

考虑到咱们以前也一起搞过 [opensource.win](https://opensource.win/) 的事情，不妨咱们就用这套来做 Answer 社区的数字化看板，目前这套方法也在我们实验室进行实验，@frank-zsy 也在其它社区做了些试点，效果挺好，能够量化贡献并激励大家往前冲~

我们甚至发起了一个[ XSOXI 计划](https://github.com/X-lab2017/open-wonderland/discussions/196)来促进社区的发展，根据贡献度给同学们发些助研的补助，效果不错~

如果有兴趣，我们可以联合 opensource.win 提供所有的数据支持和一些可视化的工具，一起来促进 Answer 社区的发展，基于此可以做的事情很多，也算是开源社区的社会实验了~

而且，等到下个月 Answer 社区的第一个月数据出来后，还可以用 [Hypercrx 插件](https://github.com/hypertrons/hypertrons-crx)对社区进行数据观测了，目前感觉社区热度在持续增加，非常期待，哈哈~

title: NA
body:
+1024

我以前提到过一个想法，就是打造一套开源社区运营的工具集，可以逐步的将各种各样的工具，集成起来，形成一套参考架构，以及"Modern Community"。

比如：开源社的OSS.chat、KToken，也可以考虑如何集成进来。

title: NA
body: Mark~    为了提升人效比 一套好的工具，一个工具箱太有必要了。  打工多年， 大家一定都有各自的宝藏工具可以共享~

body:
启动方式

$ mkdir answer && cd answer
$ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/answerdev/answer/main/docker-compose.yaml
$ docker-compose up

在点点点的过程中就 painic 了。然后强制重启，退登录。

title: NA
body: 感谢问题反馈，正在排查。如果再次出现问题，请留意触发问题的场景并反馈，万分感谢~

title: NA
body: 问题已经找到，正在修复，由于使用了 `sqlite3`，开启了 CGO，但 `cgocall` 显然在不同的机器上，即使是使用 docker，表现仍有区别。

title: NA
body:
> 问题已经找到，正在修复，由于使用了 `sqlite3`，开启了 CGO，但 `cgocall` 显然在不同的机器上，即使是使用 docker，表现仍有区别。

能否使用  [github.com/glebarez/go-sqlite](https://github.com/glebarez/go-sqlite) 代替 CGO 版本的. 基于一个纯 go 实现的 sqlite3 驱动库 [modernc.org/sqlite](https://gitlab.com/cznic/sqlite). 
经过测试.  [L8](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/blob/main/internal/base/data/data.go#L7) 行引入, config.yaml 中 driver 设置为 sqlite 即可

title: NA
body: 是的，当时也考虑过使用纯 go 实现的 sqlite 库去替代链接 CGO 编译的版本。不过目前而言我们无法保证这个类库是否能够完全替换掉目前的依赖，加上目标库的 star 数量还不够多比较担心后续的维护。所以，我们可能需要更多的测试以及支持这个想法。

body:

[L8](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/blob/main/internal/base/data/data.go#L7) 行引入, config.yaml 中 driver 设置为 sqlite 即可

title: Elasticsearch is a good candidate for the underlying database?
body:
For Q/A, is ES a better solution for this? I think it will simplify the development and improve the performance
Do you have any plan for supporting ES in you roadmap?

title: NA
body:
Meilisearch better 
https://github.com/meilisearch/meilisearch-go

title: NA
body:
Interesting idea. ElasticSearch is good for searching, but for storing data, it's still debatable.

In Answer project, we use XORM to be the abstraction layer of database, so all data operations are designed for relational database. If you want to use ElasticSearch, you need to write your own data access layer. We'll continue to discuss this issue, and add ES support in our roadmap if it's necessary.

title: NA
body:
It may be possible to use ES only for storage and search of critical data, such as titles and question content
But correspondingly, developers need to increase the cost of use. It may be better for developers to let developers freely choose what kind of DB to use.

title: NA
body: Answer will support third-party search engine such as Elasticsearch plugin.

title: NA
body: This should be a **warning** log, because the application will try to read the cache file in the cache directory when it is first started. If the cache file exist, it will be read. If the cache file does not exist, it will be created later.

title: React-router-dom version is wrong after npm install dependencies
body:
Because there is no package lock file, after using npm to install dependencies, the version of react-router-dom will use the latest v6.4.3

When react-router updated a TS type (RouteObject) in v6.4.2, there will be the red reporting problem mentioned in [this PR](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/17)

---------------------
因为没有 package lock file ，所以在使用 npm 安装依赖后，react-router-dom 的版本会使用最新的 v6.4.3

react-router 在 v6.4.2 时更新了一个 TS 类型（RouteObject），会出现[这个 PR](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/17) 提到的报红问题

title: NA
body:
Using pnpm will normally lock the version of react-router and react-router-dom to v6.4.0, no problem

----
使用 pnpm 会正常锁定 react-router 和 react-router-dom 的版本为 v6.4.0，没有问题

title: NA
body: Later versions we will solve the problem of routing type

title: 请问是否有鉴权以及加密？
body:
1. 环境
> 云服务器 Linux
> docker-compose（放了一个nginx在里面转发，走https）
2. 问题（如下图）
>可以通过普通用户删除管理员创建的词条（或者其他用户的）

![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/tydaytygx/public_images/answer_debug.png)

>数据传输是否加密？

![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/tydaytygx/public_images/answer_debug2.png)

title: NA
body:
感谢问题反馈：
1. 当前删除问题存在 bug，会马上进行修复
2. 当前，如果使用 https 那么 https 本身就是加密的，但如果使用 http 默认当前是没有加密的；数据库中密码会加密进行存储。我们推荐使用 https，也会考虑对密码进行加密处理。

然后，使用二进制运行，也找不到门路，让人不愉快的体验。

我看INSTALL.md，也说的不是很清楚。

总之，很难受，要搞懂这个错误，需要追踪很长的代码，有点沮丧，刚开始就感觉一座大山在前面。

我觉得缺少一个整体的系统启动流程图，让人有一个清晰的头绪，但是作为一个经典的前后端项目，它必然就很简单，但是目前我要追踪很多代码，才能让它在本机启动。

头大，现在一点思路都没有，然后。

title: NA
body:
感谢问题反馈
1. 当前使用 docker 安装会在当前目录下 `$PWD/answer-data` 创建 `answer-data` 文件夹，文件夹中包含配置文件等数据，启动时候提示 `/data/conf/config.yaml already exists`，证明配置文件已经存在，如果是新的初次安装，请删除 `answer-data` 文件夹中所有相关文件。如果是第二次安装，请修改对应的配置文件 `/answer-data/conf/config.yaml` 对应的数据库连接。
2. 第二次安装看日志并没有任何问题，各项初始化看日志也是正常的，启动后直接访问即可。如果是对 `[Warning] Aborted connection 9 to db: 'answer' user: 'root' host: '172.26.0.3' (Got an error reading communication packets)` 有担心，不必担心，这是一个警告提示，是由于 `docker-compose` 的 depends_on 导致，它会不断的检测 mysql 是否正常启动，这只是由于还没有正常连接的一个提示信息，不会影响 answer 正常运行。

再次感谢您的建议，有关安装这部分我们已经正在优化了，现在目前对于初次的用户来说成本较高，还会遇到一些问题，我们也正在设计解决。还有安装和使用相关的文档我们也在积极补充，后续会有更好的文档说明来解答您相关的疑惑。

title: Database connection failed
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35621758/201816859-65222820-8b36-4bd3-b346-a4504c9892cb.png)
这里填写AWS RDS会连接失败

title: NA
body:
1. First make sure that mysql is connected properly and that you are using the correct username and password
2. Then make sure mysql database has been manually created.
3. Finally, make sure that the environment is working, and if you started as a docker, make sure that the mysql address is accessible from inside the container.

I hope this can help you, if there are still problems, please continue to feedback again, we will continue to follow up.

---

1. 首先确定 mysql 是否能正常连接，是否使用了正确的用户名和密码
2. 然后确定 mysql 是否你已经手动创建了对应的数据库
3. 最后确定环境是否正常，如果你是以 docker 方式启动，确认容器内部是否能正常访问到 mysql 的地址

希望这样排查可以帮助到你，如果还是存在问题，请再继续反馈，我们会持续跟进。

title: NA
body:
背景是在一台EC2上通过docker运行了该项目
1. 在EC2上通过`mysql -h <host> -u <user> -p`是可以联通的
2. 继续步骤一的操作，输入`show databases;`可以确定并没有创建同名数据库
3. 还未测试容器内链接数据库，不清楚这个镜像的构建情况，试了下mysql命令行都没有...
4. 目前采用SQLite数据库在运行，忽略图里的sqlite3指令
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35621758/201862378-bb222bf8-04d7-457b-992b-816ae8133091.png)

title: NA
body:
明白了，对于 MySQL，Answer **不会主动的创建数据库**，你需要手动的创建一个数据库，然后在安装的时候指定你创建的数据库名称。因为我们考虑到并非所有 mysql 账户都有创建数据库的权限，很多情况下用户并不会提供如此高权限的账户，所以我们还是将创建数据库的工作交给人工自己去完成。

---

Got it. For Mysql, `Answer` does not create the database proactively, so you need to create the corresponding database manually first.

body: 确实，自己创建完库就可以链接成功了！感谢大佬及时的支持！！

Have a nice day!

Most people will want the DB file somewhere inside the same folder as the answer executable, like in the binary installation instructions on your website. Please also note that even when the db is in the /tmp folder, in the last step, the link below is dead: > 1. did you manually create a data directory such as /tmp/answer and give it read and write permissions >2. whether the sqlite data storage directory is configured under the data directory such as /tmp/answer/answer.db >3. whether answer has permission to read and write to the directory No, because your website instructions don't say to do these steps. But I did those steps anyway and the error persists. Your binary installation instructions just say run `./answer init -C ./answer-data/` and then run `./answer run -C ./answer-data/`. Does it work for you when you download the binary to your `~/downloads` folder and then run these 2 commands inside the `answer_1.0.5_macOS_arm64 ` folder? This is what most people will do to trial the application.

@nkev

title: NA
body:
According to the error message: `new database failed: dial tcp: lookup db on IP:53: no such host`

Please check your configuration file: in the configuration file 

```yaml
data:
  database:
    driver: "mysql"
    connection: "db:3306" 
```

The default database connection here in older version should be like this `db:3306`, you can modify it according to your actual mysql situation, e.g. `root:root@tcp(127.0.0.1:3306)/answer`

We recommend to modify the configuration file manually. The configuration file is in `/data/conf/config.yaml`, just restart it after modification.

---

根据错误信息提示：`new database failed:  dial tcp: lookup db on IP:53: no such host`

请查看您的配置文件：配置文件中 

```yaml
data:
  database:
    driver: "mysql"
    connection: "db:3306" 
```

在旧版本中这里的连接默认应该是这样的 `db:3306`，您可以根据您的实际mysql情况进行修改，如：`root:root@tcp(127.0.0.1:3306)/answer`

建议手动修改配置文件，配置文件目录在 `/data/conf/config.yaml`，修改后重新启动即可。

如果还出现其他问题，请提供启动的方式和命令，方便我们跟进排查解决~

title: 通过docker compose安装的怎么升级？
body:
原来的docker-compose.yaml是3.9，内容也很全。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32785798/203589313-a35fa3c0-f697-4ec1-84f3-8403c59c1cf4.png)

而现在code里的docker-compose.yaml似乎是一个半成品？
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32785798/203589140-cb8d5229-e873-4cf4-bbdb-f97a28a694d9.png)

所以，这种情况下是否可以升级？

title: NA
body:
是这样的，原来旧版本中，默认 docker-compose 使用的是 mysql，所以依赖较多；而现在 code 中 docker-compose 使用的是 sqlite，没有依赖(是为了方便新用户能快速体验到项目)。
如果你原先使用的是旧版本的 docker-compose ，并且使用 mysql 作为数据库，可以重新拉取镜像并重启即可完成升级。
```yaml
docker-compose pull
docker-compose down
docker-compose up -d
```

title: NA
body:
> 是这样的，原来旧版本中，默认 docker-compose 使用的是 mysql，所以依赖较多；而现在 code 中 docker-compose 使用的是 sqlite，没有依赖(是为了方便新用户能快速体验到项目)。 如果你原先使用的是旧版本的 docker-compose ，并且使用 mysql 作为数据库，可以重新拉取镜像并重启即可完成升级。
> 
> ```yaml
> docker-compose pull
> docker-compose down
> docker-compose up -d
> ```

谢谢！看起来pull是起作用了，但再次docker-compose up后，网站无法打开，报错如下，帮忙看看，谢谢！
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32785798/203677447-3e49d58b-da1b-4ef1-842d-9baa823b507e.png)

另外这种方式升级后，mysql中的数据可以自动保留下来吗？

title: NA
body:
@chenfengrugao 抱歉，这可能是升级上出现的 bug，我们会在下个版本进行修复。解决方式如下：
1. 手动删除 ./answer-data/i18n 目录下的所有文件(这是所有翻译的语言文件，不是数据文件，它会自动重新安装，无需担心)
2. 再次重新启动即可

所有的升级方式，均会保留原数据

title: NA
body: 谢谢！按照你的操作说明，成功了，可以访问了。

title: 💡 How to submit an issue
body:
Hi folks,

The GitHub issues list is an integral part of our community. We use it to track bugs, feature requests, and other things. Please follow the guidelines below to make sure your issue is handled correctly.

### 📔 Before you submit an issue

1. Make sure you are using the latest version of Answer.
2. Search the [issue tracker](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/issues) to make sure your issue hasn't been reported before.

### 🌐 English only

Please use English to describe your issue. We can communicate in other languages, but the issue list is only in English.

### ✏️ How to write a good issue

1. Provide a clear and descriptive title.
2. Describe the steps to reproduce the issue. Provide as much detail as possible.
3. Provide specific examples to demonstrate the steps. Include links to files or GitHub projects, or copy/pasteable snippets, which you use in those examples. If you're providing snippets in the issue, use [Markdown code blocks](https://help.github.com/articles/markdown-basics/#multiple-lines).
4. Respond to questions or requests for additional information by the time limit. If we need more information but don't hear from you, we may close the issue.

### 🔐 For security issues

If you find a **security vulnerability**, do NOT open an issue. Email to [security@answer.dev](mailto:security@answer.dev]) instead.

I try following:

a) Just type "HEAD" in the form

b) Add Tracking code:

<script async defer data-domain="fragdichschlau.com" src="https://plausibly.net/js/script.outbound-links.js"></script>
<script>window.plausible = window.plausible || function() { (window.plausible.q = window.plausible.q || []).push(arguments) }</script>

title: NA
body:
Oh oh oh, I suddenly get it. You were not seeing the insert in source code mode (I just noticed the `source code` in parentheses, sorry).

This part of the function is implemented as follows.
* The `Custom CSS` section is converted to a `custom.css` file and inserted into the `head` when rendered on the server side.
* The `Head`, `Header`, and `Footer` sections are dynamically inserted into the corresponding sections by JavaScript during client-side rendering.

**This is why you don't see the inserted content in `source code` mode. In this case, you can see the inserted content in the `Elements` panel of the developer tools.**

However, our implementation is still buggy, **the dynamically inserted script will not run**. We will fix it as soon as possible.

Thanks for your feedback!

title: Docker run answer，The server encountered an error
body:
**Describe the bug**
I run answer with docker，when I login or sign up，The server encountered an error and could not complete your request.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/439390/208552797-c79dfadf-0b44-4de1-a1bd-2aabd018ecec.png)


**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

title: Reserved word 'rank' gives query error when using mysql for db
body:
**Describe the bug**
Reserved word 'rank' gives query error when using mysql 

ex)
'select user_id, SUM(rank) AS rank_amount from activity'

it should be 
'select user_id, sum(\`rank\`) AS rank_amount from activity'

title: NA
body:
I used mysql 8 when I got that query error.
Then I downgrade it to 5.7 because 'rank' was updated for reserved word after mysql 8
It works.

title: NA
body:
If you use MySQL version 8, you will get query error from USER tab.
Because 'rank' is using as column name in 'activity' table and this 'rank' is reserved keyword in MySQL version 8.

Two options to solve this problem

1. For devs, change the column name in 'activity' 
something like  'rank' to 'user_rank'

2. For ANSWER <=1.0.1 users, use  MySQL version <= 5.7

title: CORS Error while trying to use APIs
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I would like to use answer as a backend and build my own frontend that I can embed in my existing platform. (Basically a custom client/user interface for answer) Possibly related to #127 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I would like a configurable option, which allows answer APIs to be accessed from authorised domains. i.e. enable CORS.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Alternative would be to create fork and use only the backend and modify CORS options, not exactly a favourable alternative. I am open to recommendations.

I am not very fluent with golang, but this official gin [middleware](https://github.com/gin-contrib/cors) might be of help, if we can configure `AllowOrigins` with an environment variable or from UI.

You can use nginx or other server as a proxy, in this way, you can use your custom frontend page. when the request url if matched `/api`, the proxy will request the answer backend.

title: Custom Port Options.
body:

> You can configure the port through the [configuration file](https://answer.dev/docs/configfile).

第一次运行时默认监听80端口，在没有root的情况下会报错，无法生成完整的配置文件，希望能解决这个问题

title: NA
body:
The port can be specified via the environment variable [INSTALL_PORT](https://answer.dev/docs/env) during the first installation. 

This is partly because only the root user can use port 80, and partly because you need to use `-C` to specify the directory that **the current user can access as the data directory**.

1. `/i18n/init.ts` This file is only used to build in the two languages and do the initialization of the i18n, the other language configurations are loaded on demand. There is no problem with this part.

Thanks!

title: Limit register email to domain or regex
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I am planning on setting up an instance of answer in my uni, but for that I would need to limit the registrations to emails of my university. Creating the users manually is not feasible, as there are too many people to do that by hand and I would have to do so every year.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like to configure an email domain, like e.g. `mail.myuni.edu`, so you could only register with a mail of the form `xxxxxx@mail.myuni.edu`, but no with `xxxxxx@myuni.edu` or `xxxxx@mail.example.com`. This should not interfere with manually created users, so when installing Answer or manually creating a user I could do `admin@myuni.edu` and it should work perfectly and allow login.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Another option could be allowing to limit emails to match a regex pattern defined by the administrator. This could also affect manually created users because you could just add an or to the regex with the email you want to create the account for. Only side effect of this is that if you manually create many accounts, the regex might get too long and matching the regex with the email would increasingly take longer. On the good side, it is way more flexible than my proposed option.

title: NA
body: That's a good idea. We'll try to improve this feature.

title: NA
body:
Until this feature is implemented you can prevent the registration of other domain users by simply adding a constraint on the `user.e_mail`:

So for example, if you want to limit users to be able to register with `<>@answer.dev` email only you could apply:

```sql
ALTER TABLE public.user ADD CONSTRAINT check_email CHECK (e_mail ~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._+%-]+@answer[.]dev$');
```

> The above query was tested with PosgreSQL

The app will throw an internal DB exception but you prevent unwanted registrations ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

title: Security concern
body:
Hello 👋

I run a security community that finds and fixes vulnerabilities in OSS. A researcher (@shangrui-hash) has found a potential issue, which I would be eager to share with you.

Could you add a `SECURITY.md` file with an e-mail address for me to send further details to? GitHub [recommends](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/getting-started/adding-a-security-policy-to-your-repository) a security policy to ensure issues are responsibly disclosed, and it would help direct researchers in the future.

Looking forward to hearing from you 👍

(cc @huntr-helper)

title: NA
body: Hi, thanks for your feedback, and we'll add a `SECURITY.md` soon. We do have an e-mail address ([security@answer.dev](mailto:security@answer.dev)) for security issues, you can contact us through this way.

title: NA
body: any updates in regards to these 'security concerns'?

title: NA
body:
> any updates in regards to these 'security concerns'?

We have fixed some issues and are checking if all API have similar issues. We'll be bringing a more secure and reliable Answer in the next release.

title: Rank fail to meet the condition.
body:
**Describe the bug**
After installing Answer 1.0.2, I created a user. This user should ask the first question. But saving the question is not possible, because this - meaningless - error message appears:

**Rank fail to meet the condition.**

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Installation Answer 1.0.2
2. registration user
3. manual release of the user in the admin dashboard
4. ask new question
5. title, text filled in
6. tags created
7. send question
8. error message appears

**Expected behavior**
Question should be saved.

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Desktop
 - OS: Windows 11
 - Browser Firefox
 - Version 108.0.2

title: NA
body:
The reason is below.
1. Modifying the user status directly from the admin does not activate the user directly, resulting in the activated reputation not being added and the user's reputation is 0.
2. Since there is a reputation requirement to ask a question, there is no way to ask a question with a reputation of 0.

This is really a problem. We will fix it ASAP.

title: NA
body:
Ok. Thanks.
Yes, I can confirm that if the user is activated via activation link, then asking questions also works perfectly.

title: NA
body: Fix in v1.0.3

title: Updating to version 1.0.3 still has tag issues
body:
更新到1.0.3 该问题仍然存在.

1. 问题列表显示的标签仍然显示的是**固定链接** 而**不是别名**
Tags shown in issue list still show permalinks instead of aliases
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12946956/212635456-a80f8e05-063f-4c50-93cb-db94f35017db.png)

2. 问题详情及问题编辑界面 显示的标签仍然是 **固定链接** 而**不是别名**
The tag displayed on the issue details and issue editing interface is still a permalinks  instead of an alias
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12946956/212635653-3a2641f8-dc73-4c43-98a0-6adb9e3cf220.png)

3. 问题编辑添加标签,可以输入别名搜索, 但是匹配结果是 **固定链接**, 建议可以显示: 别名(固定链接) 或者别的形式
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12946956/212636029-78bbbdc3-61d7-4c67-9eae-3845864bed3d.png)

6. 标签列表显示的仍然是 **固定链接** 而非 **别名**, 这是设计如此还是bug?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12946956/212636191-62de45ca-1798-4ecc-88a4-bc4aba824fb0.png)

title: NA
body: @LinkinStars

title: NA
body:
First of all, thank you very much for using Answer @Dev-Wiki . Regarding the above issue, the explanation is as follows

1. The current tag has two attributes: `display name` (显示名称（别名）in chinese) `slug name` (URL 固定链接 in chinese)
2. In our product design, except for the tag details page (/tags/{tag}), all other displays are slug name.
3. Some misunderstandings may have resulted from incorrect Chinese translations.
4. The current version in v1.0.3 already supports Chinese tags, you can directly modify `slug name` (URL 固定链接) to Chinese to meet your requirements.
5. We will also reconsider your issue from the product point of view. @fenbox

我学习了一下关于 url slug 的内容:
[什么是固定链接地址(slug)及其对SEO的重要性 - hrefgo超狗](https://hrefgo.com/blog/what-is-a-url-slug)

下面是我的想法:

目前支持中文标签已经很好解决问题, 之前是我对 url slug 有问题.

如果有开发经验或者具有seo经验或者了解 url slug 的人员使用本项目, 目前的新建标签支持用户手动修改 url slug 可以很好解决搜索的问题,

如果像我之前对这个不理解,或者完全不懂的用户来说, 默认 显示名称和 固定链接 是相同内容也是一个比较好的做法.

title: 数据库连接超时
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43983920/213451834-75f11cbd-79e7-4b66-8604-b635c93650f2.png)

步骤
1：创建docker-compose 文件
```yaml
version: "3"
services:
  answer:
    image: answerdev/answer
    ports:
      - '9080:80'
    restart: on-failure
    volumes:
      - answer-data:/data

volumes:
  answer-data:
```
执行命令
```shell
docker-compose pull
docker-compose down
docker-compose up -d
```

连接宿主机 mysql
```shell

mysql > GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON answer.* TO 'answer'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '密码' WITH GRANT OPTION;
mysql > flush privileges;

```

打开网站。 执行程序安装。 连接数据库的时候network 显示请求超时

title: not able to update user profile
body:
**Describe the bug**
updating a user profile results in an error message.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. create a user name with a hyphen (-) and spaces( ) and uppercase letters in the user name, during the initial setup/wizard.
2. log in as user.
3. Try and update any field for user name 'name-name'


**Expected behavior**
Do not allow the unallowed character (-) and spaces ( ) to be used in the username during the initial setup/wizard.
The same error message should be displayed during the initial setup. 

**Screenshots**

![username error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96728533/214918837-97ed2730-dc1a-4ef9-aedf-97079f50e40f.png)

title: NA
body:
Thanks for your feedback. 
1.  Our username rules can only contain 0-9, lowercase letters a-z, -, . , _, and if there are spaces, they will be replaced by '_'.
2. We did not check this rule during registration and initialization, we will fix this bug in 1.1.0.

title: 内部使用的时候遇到的一些问题和 Bug 修复「https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/191」
body:
首先非常感谢有这么好的一个开源项目供内部使用。但是在其中使用的时候发现或者遇到了一些问题，所以做了一些代码更改。

- 「feat」作为内部系统，需要告知大家应该在这里提交什么样的问题，那么一个类似于公告的东西是我们需要的。为了避免对代码的过多改造，支持了将问题置顶的功能，可以解决这个问题。
- 「fix」在取消点赞的时候，发现内部报错，后发现是一个关键字导致的。https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/195
- 「feat」作为内部系统，需要控制标签不那么杂乱，同时想设定能够管理员内置新增一些标签，所以支持了管理员在标签页增加标签的功能。
- 「fix」在使用标签同义词的时候，发现如果将 B 设置为 A 的同义词，那么之前绑定了 B 标签的问题将无法找到，通过索引 A 标签的方式。https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/196


见 PR：https://github.com/answerdev/answer/pull/191

NA

确实标签 A 的问题列表应该包含标签 B 的问题

body:
looks like Goal or purpose is same but just the way of achieving it is different - its wise to add that content here. If anyone works on this they have this context.

#744 

## Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe
**Pseduo Anonymity** encourages users to ask question, raise concerns which they can't ask publicly due to risk of rising that question. And Same applies for answering to the question. Even though community members know what they have to do. They won't/can't do it considering risk

this product is used By Hr professionals for building organization culture, making employees help each other. For cases like Abuse, discrimination in any form of nature or even it might be related to some sensitive events where people are shy to ask.  

## Describe the solution you'd like
Levels.FYI solves problem of Pseudo anonymous Identity in their platform. Checkout their community section https://www.levels.fyi/community.
while user creation, user will option for alias name. they can input that or use system generated names. while they are participating in community it provides option for toggling their identity levels.

if user with to identify them self profile hyperlink will work. else link would be disabled

## Describe alternatives you've considered
users might/can need create fake accounts for Pseudo anonymous Identity. Fake accounts can lead all together to a different problem. when org take actions of fake accounts users who have it them loose their anonymous purpose

title: Need attachment-upload feature
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Sometimes we have to upload large-text-file(such as large-HTTP-response/large-logging) to questions. If we put these text within qustion description, it makes we hard to read the core question text.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Just like add attachment to email.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
I think add-attachment is the most popular manner, or we have to make another CDN like to store these files.

title: NA
body:
@fenbox Hi~
I have some ideas regarding this issue. Perhaps we could develop a package to manage files? This package would support local storage or storage on S3, allow for duplicate file processing, and could serve as a foundational package for development related to apache/incubator-answer-plugins#257.

title: NA
body:
@sosyz We can use the [Kano Model](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kano_model) to analyze the "files management package". I think it's not a Must-be or One-dimensional requirements. So this feature is not suitable as a core feature.

But there are some users who need this feature, so it's suitable as a plugin.

title: Need permission configure to delete answer
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
While some abuse answers among questions, the admin need to delete them, all delete click throw "No permission to delete". And I can't find such configure to enable the deletion.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Enable high-permission user to delete any answers of questions.

title: NA
body:
Currently in answer system, administrators and moderator and authors have permission to delete. you can add admin privileges to a user from the path below.

-> /admin -> /admin/users

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30591202/223316967-e29111be-e9fc-4f99-99c1-9038fb407039.png)


then click action
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30591202/223317144-2fa897f4-3ff0-42b2-b698-0d4cfa6a6ee1.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30591202/223317225-187cee48-5dc9-41e7-b257-f7e7825ef1a6.png)


By following the steps above, you can change the permissions of some users in the system. Of course only administrators can enter /admin, so please log in with an administrator account to complete the above wipe.

title: NA
body: I can't delete the answer writen by myself, should I make everyone of my team members as the admin?

title: NA
body:
What is the role of your current login account? Does your login account have access to /admin? If you can access /admin normally, then your current logged-in user is already an administrator and can delete any content.If it is just an ordinary user, then he can only delete the content written by himself.

You just need to set the administrator role for the users who need administrative rights.

title: Uncomfortable Chinese url paths : 10010000000000001/rang-ren-gan-dao-bu-shi-ying-de-zhong-wen-lu-jing-she-ji
body:
When the community generates content with a Chinese title, the resulting url path is very uncomfortable, especially for those who are compulsive about clean URLs.

For example, creating the article：[何谓老子所倡导「道德」之学？](https://answer.lovejade.cn/questions/10010000000000001/he-wei-lao-zi-suo-chang-dao-dao-de-zhi-xue)，Its address is shaped as `10010000000000001/he-wei-lao-zi-suo-chang-dao-dao-de-zhi-xue`，Such a design is intimidating. I think a self-incrementing count would be much better than this（For example:  `1/1`、`post/2`）. At least the user should be given a way to freely modify it.

I hope this can be seriously considered, thanks.

title: NA
body:

title: Can't send email via SMTP Server without using SSL
body:
config the email server with SSL=none and then in logfile show  :
send email to xxx@xxx.com failed: x509: cannot validate certificate for 10.x.x.x because it doesn't contain any IP SANs
(internal/service/export/email_service.go  line 132)
 - Version [1.0.6]

looks like ignoring the SSL setting to none and still trying an SSL connection?

We will continue to follow up on this issue. You can help us by providing more information, such as how your SMTP service is set up, what server environment you are using, docker or binary etc.

title: Users with "User" role get a 403 error when trying to upvote or downvote an answer.
body:
**Describe the bug**
Users with "User" role get a 403 error when trying to upvote or downvote an answer.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Log in as a user with User role
2. Go to any question
3. Click upvote or downvote on any answer
4. Check developer tools for 403 error

**Expected behavior**
Regular users with "User" role should be able to upvote and downvote answers.


**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Desktop

title: Attempt to reconnect to the provided database at startup.
body:
**Describe the bug**
When entrypoint.sh starts with answer init, and the database is not ready for connections yet, the whole process fails and does not attempt to reconnect to the database.

**To Reproduce**
I found this out by deploying a sidecar for GCP cloud-sql-proxy. The startup of answer happens so quickly that the cloud-sql-proxy is not completely ready to accept connections yet and then startup fails because the database is not ready. I was able to get passed this by bypassing entrypoint.sh and adding a 5 second sleep before answer init runs.

**Expected behavior**
Ideally, the process would keep trying to connect to the provided database in config.yaml if its there from a previous configuration.

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Kubernetes (GKE)
 - Answer Version 1.0.7
 - Database: Postgres

title: NA
body: @cl-christschantz I'm not really sure, but would it be possible to try starting the database proxy first and using readiness to ensure that sidecar has finished starting first before starting Answer?

title: NA
body: @LinkinStars Thanks for the response. In Kubernetes, containers are spun up in parallel so there is not really a way to control timing or order of when they start. Unlike docker where you can use depends_on.

title: NA
body:
根据你提供的错误日志，看起来是在使用 PostgreSQL 数据库时出现了一个问题。具体来说，这个错误是由于尝试将一个空字符串转换为 bigint 类型所引起的。这通常表示在数据库中的某个地方，一个期望是非空 bigint 类型的列或变量，实际上包含了一个空字符串。

为了解决这个问题，你可以检查你的代码，查看是否有任何尝试将空字符串赋值给 bigint 类型的操作。如果是这种情况，请确保在将值插入数据库之前先检查它是否为空。

另外，你还可以检查数据库中的表结构，确保所有 bigint 列都被定义为非空类型。如果存在空字符串的情况，你可以考虑将这些列的默认值更改为适当的非空值，或者在插入数据时显式指定这些列的值。

最后，如果你仍然无法解决问题，你可能需要进一步调查错误日志中提供的堆栈跟踪，以找到导致该错误的具体代码行。

title: Performance bottleneck and latency issue with MySQL database, requesting support for MongoDB
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
The website is experiencing significant performance issues due to a bottleneck in the MySQL database. With 21.5 million questions and 64.72 million answers in the database, the website is becoming sluggish and response times are exceeding five seconds. The current server has 4 cores and 24GB of memory, which is not sufficient to handle the load.

**Describe the solution you'd like** 
I would like to request support for MongoDB as an alternative database. MongoDB's document-based architecture should provide better performance and scalability compared to MySQL, which is becoming increasingly difficult to manage with the growing number of questions and answers.

**Describe alternatives you've considered** 
We have considered various alternatives such as upgrading the server hardware or optimizing the existing MySQL database. However, we believe that MongoDB would be a more effective solution in the long term due to its scalability and performance benefits.

title: NA
body: There is a big difference between MongoDB and MySQL, and we can't support both.

Based on the error logs provided, it appears that there is an issue with the PostgreSQL database in relation to input syntax for a bigint type. Additionally, there is a duplicate key value violation error, which suggests that there may be an attempt to insert a record with a key that already exists.

To report this issue, you can use the following issue template:

Describe the bug
There seems to be an issue with the PostgreSQL database related to input syntax for a bigint type, as well as a duplicate key value violation error.

To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

Attempt to insert a record with a key that already exists.
Perform a query using a bigint type.
Note the resulting errors in the log.
Expected behavior
There should be no errors related to input syntax or duplicate key value violations.

Screenshots
N/A

Platform

PostgreSQL version: 15.2
CPU：ARM
Operating system:  debian/docker
Relevant application and version: 1.0.8

title: NA
body:
@UlricQin Sorry, I may have found the cause of the issue.
Please shut down the Answer service and re-execute the following command
```bash
./answer init -C ./answer-data/
./answer upgrade -C ./answer-data/
./answer run -C ./answer-data/
```
This folder `./answer-data/` needs to be specified according to the actual path that you used.

---

The following are the causes of the issue.
Since only `./answer init` command replaces the i18n file, the docker image executes the `init` command every time it reboots by default, and the binary deployment just ignores this step.
We will fix this later so that binary upgrades will also replace the latest i18n files.

@BingYanchi FYI: 

According to your log output, the upgrade was not successful and the current version should be higher or equal to 1.0.9. Please try to fix it according to the following steps.


1. Execute the following script in the database to query the current version of Answer
```sql
SELECT `version_number` FROM version WHERE id = '1'
```

2. Modify the version number to 2 levels lower
```sql
UPDATE version SET `version_number` = `version_number` - 2 WHERE id = '1'
```

3. Execute the upgrade command and see if the upgrade is normal and the upgrade log is output
. /answer upgrade -C . /answer-data/

title: Add support for parametrizing the base path
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, the application does not allow users to parametrize the base path, which makes it difficult to configure a reverse proxy with path routing. This lack of flexibility can hinder deployment in certain scenarios and configurations.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Please add support for parametrizing the base path within the application's configuration. This feature would enable users to set up a reverse proxy with path routing more easily and allow for seamless integration with various deployment environments. Ideally, this should be done in a way that doesn't break existing configurations.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
I have considered using URL rewriting to work around this limitation, but it's less efficient and can potentially cause issues with certain configurations.

**Additional context**
The ability to parametrize the base path is a common feature in many web applications and would greatly improve the flexibility and ease of deployment for the `answer` application. By supporting this feature, we can ensure that the application remains adaptable to a variety of infrastructures and configurations.

title: NA
body: Would be great. Please build.

title: Cannot open user details
body:
**Describe the bug**
Clicking on a user raises a server error.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to Users
2. Click on a user
3. See error HTTP 50X

Server logs:
```
ERROR	/go/src/github.com/answerdev/answer/answer_build3060150450/vendor/github.com/answerdev/answer/internal/base/handler/handler.go:36	code: 500, reason: base.database_error, message: , error: pq: invalid input syntax for type bigint: ""
```

Database logs:
```
,
PostgreSQL Database directory appears to contain a database; Skipping initialization,
,
[34] ERROR:  invalid input syntax for type bigint: "",
[34] CONTEXT:  unnamed portal parameter $3 = '',
[34] STATEMENT:  SELECT "id", "created_at", "updated_at", "question_id", "user_id", "last_edit_user_id", "original_text", "parsed_text", "status", "adopted", "comment_count", "vote_count", "revision_id" FROM "answer" WHERE (user_id = $1) AND (status = $2 OR user_id = $3) ORDER BY vote_count desc LIMIT 5,
```

It looks like `user_id` is empty.

Reply to browser request `GET http://localhost/answer/api/v1/personal/qa/top?username=admin`:
```json
{"code":500,"reason":"base.database_error","msg":"Data server error.","data":{"answer":[],"question":[]}}
```

**Expected behavior**
See user details.

**Screenshots**

Not a screenshot, but it is pretty close to it :)
```
(=‘x‘=)
HTTP Error 50X
The server encountered an error and could not complete your request.
```

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
Docker image, 1.1.0, Postgres database, OAuth2 plugin enabled.

title: NA
body:
The problem only happens when using Postgres. SQLite and MySQL are not affected. SQLite does not enforce type checks, and MySQL has some peculiar implicit casting:

Sqlite:
```
sqlite> select * from answer where user_id = '';
sqlite> 
```

MySQL:
```
mysql> select * from answer where user_id = '';
Empty set (0.00 sec)
```

This is because an empty string is cast to `0` in both databases, thus hiding the coding error.
Postgres fails:

Postgres:
```
answer=# select * from answer where user_id = '';
ERROR:  invalid input syntax for type bigint: ""
LINE 1: select * from answer where user_id = '';
```

title: NA
body:
The problem seems to came from here:

https://github.com/answerdev/answer/blob/6695200b65335b360a100fa73cb0c3d96b974592/internal/base/middleware/auth.go#L144-L150

So, returning an empty string when the value is `nil`, equals to returning `0`. This would include results of a user with id 0 potentially.

I am not familiar with Go, but it is my understanding that an error should be returned together with the empty string, and the caller should check if there is an error (like you already do with `GetUserBasicInfoByUserName` for example) and do not add the user id as parameter if it is missing, or use a pointer (like for `GetUserInfoFromContext`).

I also found that XORM casts `nil` to `NULL`: https://gitea.com/xorm/xorm/pulls/531

title: NA
body:
Lots of detail posted by frafra. Fixing this should also close the following issues:

https://github.com/answerdev/answer/issues/321
https://github.com/answerdev/answer/issues/328

title: NA
NA
body:
> Bug is here: https://github.com/answerdev/answer/blob/main/internal/repo/answer/answer_repo.go#L246 There should be search.UserID as second parameter.
> 
> @frafra No, problem not in GetLoginUserIDFromContext(), you should pass Authorization token.

Thanks for the feedback. Postgres does have problems. We will fix this issue in the latest version
https://github.com/answerdev/answer/blob/b5472c793f1ff70872b000075a8d6781cf8f74a9/internal/repo/answer/answer_repo.go#LL246C25-L246C26

title: NA
body: I get it. You can't use Google's password directly, partly because it's insecure, and also because Google doesn't allow it right now. title: Using `answer build --with <plugin>` results in `build failed open build\asset-manifest.json: file does not exist`
body:
**Describe the bug**
I'm working on adding a plugin for DexIdP as part of issue answerdev/plugins#19, while developing it I wanted to test the plugin I've made and encountered trouble building answer with my plugin (or any other plugin like the supported github connector plugin) 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to [Answer Releases](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/releases/tag/v1.1.0)
2. Download answer v1.1.0
3. Extract and execute the following command:
```bash
.\answer.exe build --with github.com/itamadev/plugins/connector/dexidp@v0.0.0-20230610145225-757e43bd8501 --output ./new-answer.exe
```
5. See output + error: `build failed open build\asset-manifest.json: file does not exist`

```bash
try to build a new answer with plugins:
github.com/itamadev/plugins/connector/dexidp@v0.0.0-20230610145225-757e43bd8501
[build] tmp dir: C:\code\@github.com\itamadev\answer_build3203089807
[go mod tidy]
go: finding module for package github.com/itamadev/plugins/connector/dexidp
go: finding module for package github.com/answerdev/answer/cmd
go: found github.com/answerdev/answer/cmd in github.com/answerdev/answer v1.1.0
go: found github.com/itamadev/plugins/connector/dexidp in github.com/itamadev/plugins/connector/dexidp v0.0.0-20230610145225-757e43bd8501
[go mod vendor]
try to merge i18n files
i18n dir:  C:\<path-to-build>\vendor\github.com\itamadev\plugins\connector\dexidp\i18n
try to replace ui build directory
build failed open build\asset-manifest.json: file does not exist
```

**Expected behavior**
The command should install the new plugin and result in a new binary for running answer.dev

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 11
 - Version answer binary 1.1.0 for windows

title: NA
body:
I've already dug around the code and located the function this error occurs in: 

```golang
// internal/cli/build.go
func replaceNecessaryFile(b *buildingMaterial) (err error) {
	fmt.Printf("try to replace ui build directory\n")
	uiBuildDir := filepath.Join(b.tmpDir, "vendor/github.com/answerdev/answer/ui")
	err = copyDirEntries(ui.Build, ".", uiBuildDir)
	return err
}
```
I might just try go down that rabbit hole and find a solution for this 🤔

title: NA
body:
@itamadev First of all thank you very much for your contribution to the plugin.

I tried to compile with your plugin on `mac` and `linux`, no problem, build was successful. So sorry, it's not a problem with your plugin, it might be related to `windows` platform. I am not sure if I need to specify `GOOS` `GOARCH` manually when compiling on `windows` platform. I need to find a `windows` machine to test it.  🤔

![image](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/assets/19712692/76a504cf-cb8d-427a-85c4-ae2b42cd1a42)

body:
Thank you and you're welcome, I'm happy to contribute to this project!

And I'll be happy to help with that, I started debugging this issue on my windows machine and will probably continue throughout the day, 

I'll be sure to post here on any updates regarding any progress I make.

title: NA
body: @LinkinStars So I think I found a solution and I'm working on a PR rn, but just a general question, the function `copyDirEntries` basically implements a `Directory Walking` functionality - which in go is already implemented in `io.fs` using `fs.WalkDir()`, is there any particular reason why this is implemented like that? maybe this can be a better implementation overall

title: Document how to use Oauth2 with examples
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I'm trying to set up Answer in a Docker container using docker-compose, and would like to specify oauth2 configuration to connect to Azure AD, and to specify access levels based on Azure AD groups.

I've been looking at the documentation and the example plugin coded, but I still have no idea about how to do the configuration.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

An entry in the documentation about how to configure.
Preferable this can be done by using environmental variables, such as (on top of my head) these:
```
   OAUTH2_TENENT_ID=
   OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=
   OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=
   OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URL=
   OAUTH2_SIGNOUT_URL=
   OAUTH2_CLAIMS_SCOPE=groups
   OAUTH2_ADMIN_GROUP=
   OAUTH2_MODERATOR_GROUP=
   OAUTH2_USER_GROUP=
```

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

A configuration file saved to the data folder could be an option, too.

title: NA
body: @f-steff You can config OAuth2 plugin at `Admin->Plugins` page.

title: NA
body:
Thank you, yes, that's an option; I've also used it to test the configuration. 
But it would be very convenient to set it directly in the docker-compose.yml so that all the configuration is only one place - in fact, I'd prefer if it was possible to make the Admin->Plugin page read-only, too. This will easier allow me to store the configuration in git.

Regarding the documentation of how to use Oauth2, I used the below configuration data to make it work with Azure AD. 
You are welcome to publish this as an example in your documentation.

ClientID: {Application ID}
ClientSecret: {Secret}
Authorize URL: https://login.microsoftonline.com/{DirectoryID}/oauth2/v2.0/authorize
Token URL: https://login.microsoftonline.com/{DirectoryID}/oauth2/v2.0/token
User JSON URL: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me
User ID JSON Path: id
User Display Name JSON Path: displayName
User Username JSON Path: userPrincipalName
User Email JSON Path: userPrincipalName
User Avatar JSON Path: Blank - Nothing like this exists in Azure AD. Instead, it must be parsed from the values returned from https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me coupled with this URL: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/photo/$value
Check Email Verified: Off
Email Verified JSON Path: userPrincipalName
Scope: openid, User.Read

In Azure AD, the User.Read access must be granted in Enterprise Application, too.

And, yes, userPrincipalName is used three times.

title: NA
body: @f-steff Thank you very much, we will put this information in the documentation to help first time users to configure it.

@lostmaniac You can try to fix it by doing a manual upgrade using the following

1. pull the latest answer docker image: `docker pull answerdev/answer:latest`
2. Start and enter the docker container: `docker exec -it answer bash` answer is your container name.

If the upgrade fails in the process, please reply to the upgrade failure log.

title: SMTP I/O Timeout when using gmail as smtp server
body:
**Describe the bug**
SMTP I/O Timeout when using gmail as smtp server

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to Admin > Settings > SMTP
2. From Email = email address I want it sent _from_ (eg... `from@gmail.com`)
3. From Name = Name of email address (set to the name of the gmail address
4. SMTP host = `smtp.gmail.com` (validated it can ping it with `docker-compose exec app ping smtp.google.com`)
5. Encryption = SSL (as per https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229?hl=en#zippy=%2Cstep-change-smtp-other-settings-in-your-email-client)
6. Port = 465 (as per https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229?hl=en#zippy=%2Cstep-change-smtp-other-settings-in-your-email-client)
7. SMTP Auth = True (as per https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229?hl=en#zippy=%2Cstep-change-smtp-other-settings-in-your-email-client)
8. SMTP Userame = From Email
9. SMTP = App Password (as generated from https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?sjid=11825684452504850026-AP)
10. Test Email = My email address

**Expected behavior**
I receive a test email in my inbox (or spambox)

**Text Log**
```
12_answer-app-1  | 2023-06-18 01:39:17.261      INFO    /go/src/github.com/answerdev/answer/answer_build3810709146/vendor/github.com/answerdev/answer/internal/service/export/email_service.go:103      try to send email to [CENSORED]@gmail.com
12_answer-app-1  | 2023-06-18 01:39:27.262      ERROR   /go/src/github.com/answerdev/answer/answer_build3810709146/vendor/github.com/answerdev/answer/internal/service/export/email_service.go:125      send email to [CENSORED]@gmail.com failed: dial tcp 142.251.12.109:465: i/o timeout
```

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Docker
 - OS: Docker
 - Version: answerdev/answer:latest

**Docker Compose File**
```
version: '3.3'

services:
  mysql:
    image: mariadb:10.11
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - ./db:/var/lib/mysql
    environment:
      - MYSQL_DATABASE=answer
      - MYSQL_USER=root
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD=NotMyPassword
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=NotMyPassword
    networks:
      backend:

  app:
    image: answerdev/answer:latest
    restart: always
    depends_on:
      - mysql

    volumes:
      - ./data:/data
    labels:
      - traefik.enable=true
      - traefik.http.routers.answer.rule=Host(`Not.sharing.xyz`)
      - traefik.http.routers.answer.service=answer
      - traefik.http.routers.answer.tls=true
      - traefik.http.services.answer.loadbalancer.server.port=80
    networks:
      1_networking:
      backend:

networks:
    1_networking:
        name: 1_networking
        ipam:
            config:
                - subnet: 10.10.10.0/24
                
    backend:
```

title: Email notifications about new questions
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
We are using Answer.dev as an internal Q&A platform, where internal teams answer questions coming from other developers in our organization. When people are asking a question, they can tag the corresponding team, and each member of said team follows the tags related to them. Unfortunately, we don't see a way to get notifications about a new question being posted with a specific tag, so we resort to checking Answer manually "every now and then". 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
We would love to have an option in the settings for "notify about new questions/new questions for the tags you follow", but even having an option to get notified on any new question coming in would be great.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
For now, we're simply resorting to taking a look into our instance of Answer every now and then (and a Slack reminder to do so before clocking out).

title: NA
body: Released in [v1.1.2](https://github.com/answerdev/answer/releases/tag/v1.1.2). You can turn on email notification in `User -> Settings -> Notification`.

title: Multiple db connections opened for sqlite
body:
**Describe the bug**
sqlite only supports max_open_conn=1, but there are several instances where multiple db connections are opened.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open any questions page and up/down vote a comment
2. Now the website should be very unresponsive as there are processes in blocked state

**Expected behavior**
Pressing up/down vote buttons should not slow down the website.

**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Desktop
 - OS: macOS
 - Browser: chrome
 - Version: 1.1.0

**Source code analysis**
vote_repo.go (line 78)
- session.Context(ctx) is called -> new db connection
- then, at line 90, vr.CheckRank() is called which eventually calls configService.GetConfigByKey, creating another db connection

There are several other instances of this behavior.
I think GetConfigByKey(ctx context.Context, key string)
should take session *Session, not ctx context.Context
Or we could have values from config table, loaded into cache on startup, so that config values could be read from cache all the time.

title: NA
body: Fix in v1.1.1

title: Scrollbar bug & more
body:
### Scrollbar bug
Create a new post and quickly move the mouse over the available icons in the wysiwyg editor. If you do it fast enough, multiple popups are open at the same time and one is forced into the next line, which not just looks weird, it can also shift the entire page because of a scrollbar appearing and then disappearing again. I tested this on a 1920x1080 monitor in fullscreen. If the scrollbar exists ahead of time, no noticible shift happens and the miss-placed popup is way harder to notice.

### Visists counter
The counter goes up even if the page is just refreshed. This is not acceptable as it can be used to artificially blow posts up and annoy staff / visitors. There needs to be some kind of check to prevent this. This is not easy as guests should also count but there needs some kind of check in place. Maybe not IP but a few semi-unique combined pieces of information for guests and account ids for logged in users. Doesn't need a  100% waterproof solution but at least it needs to be thought about.

### Multiple different OAuth provider
Probably belongs into answerdev/plugins but i'll note it here anyway.
Having one OAuth provider is not enough. I should be able to use as many as i want to and not be locked to one to increase the potential userbase.

### Answering my own question inside the content, not a new answer.
If i have a simple question that i want to write an answer for, i am forced to put something inside the the "content" textbox. Instead of forcing me to write something super obvious or just repeating the question from the title, i should be allowed to put the answer in directly. One real example:

Title: "What are the reasons for a ban?"
Content: "Is there a list of things that i can avoid to get banned?"
Self-Answer: "Yes, [...]"

The person was forced to basically write the same question inside the content because the title was so self-explanatory that there was nothing of value to add. It doesn't look good, adds nothing of value and could be much more compact and readable if the person was just allowed to put the answer into that content block.

I get that not every question is that obvious and sometimes more context is needed but in hyper specialized communities, self-answered questions usually are that simple and should be accounted for.

title: NA
body:
@Slluxx About `Multiple different OAuth provider`. If you need more than one OAuth login platform, you can package several plugins. For example:
```bash
./answer build --with github.com/answerdev/plugins/connector/github  --with github.com/answerdev/plugins/connector/google
```
Detailed documentation can be found at https://answer.dev/docs/development/extending/

Thank you very much for your feedback, and recommended to divide this issue into multiple ones so that we can easily assign them to different members for processing.

body:
A few more things i noticed:

### User deletion
Deleting a user does not really delete a user. Some information is still available in the dashboard and thus in the database. I should be able to prune/force delete to remove **everything** from that user. I am not sure what the best way to handle comments/answers on other users questions would be like (eg remove everything and replace with generic message or keep message and replace username with `deleted-user`, `banned-user` or whatever) but keeping certain userdata when specifically deleting a user is a no-go

### Compliances (GDPR/EU/...)
Cookie notices, user information requests/dumps/deletions

### Installations
When setting this up with a database and the database name can not be found, it should asked to create the database instead of throwing an error message.

### Edit users
It should be possible to edit every users entire data (username, profile picture, bio, etc) instead of just editing their password.

> Answering my own question inside the content, not a new answer.

Thank you for your suggestion. While we understand your point of view, Answer's design is intended to ensure high-quality content and readability. Therefore, we recommend separating questions and answers into different sections. 

If your question and answer are very simple, you can provide the same content in both sections, which will not affect the quality or readability.

The solutions I propose are as follows -

1. Pattern match the website URL with well knows hosting providers and conditionally render the corresponding icons. 
[Relevant code in repository](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/blob/da490d4006281376313abd984a0e75450d6e9041/ui/src/pages/Users/Personal/components/UserInfo/index.tsx#L125)

2.  In case of GitHub hosting, GitHub username can be found from the URL (As far as I understand the subdomain section of `github.io` in the website URL should work).
[Relevant code in repository](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/blob/da490d4006281376313abd984a0e75450d6e9041/ui/src/pages/Users/Personal/components/UserInfo/index.tsx#L99)
    #### Implementation details: 
    We can add a `div` below the existing `data.username` and create a GitHub page link by concatenating  github username with githul base URL. We can additionally give the user the option to add custom GitHub profile URL instead of the one fetched from website, in case the website is hosted on some other GitHub account, for any particular reason, or disable the feature of extracting GitHub from website URL.

Please share your thoughts and feedback on these. If approved, I'm ready to proceed with implementation.

In your project, the github.com/golang/image package is being used at version golang.org/x/image v0.1.0, but the patched version is v0.5.0. To fix the vulnerability, we recommend modifying the go.mod file to update the version to v0.5.0 or higher. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

title: NA
How to set "enabled_original_user_system"
body: I want to only use OAuth2 to login. So how to disable the original user system.

title: NA
body:
@kuangmeng 
`Connector Plugin` only can help we to access the `Oauth2` Login. It can't replace the original user system directly. The `enabled_original_user_system` configuration you mentioned is used for the `UserCenter` plugin. The usage case of this plugin is that it will directly replace the original user system and use a third-party user system to log in and control the users of the whole system. For example, if a company already has an internal user system and wants to connect to Answer. After using it, all the operations about the users, including the role and status, will be proxy by `UserCenter`.

At present, we only provide the `Connector` plugin, and the `UserCenter` needs to be written according to your business.

So, if you only need to enable third-party login, then using Connector is good. If you want to directly proxy the entire user system, developing a new `UserCenter` plugin might be another option.

title: NA
body: Thanks. @LinkinStars I found that it still needs to verify an email in Answer after being connected with OAuth2. I want to know how to turn off this verification step (modifying code or setting a parameter).

title: NA
body: @kuangmeng I got it. Generally speaking you don't need to change the code. The reason you need to verify your email address again after using the `Connector` plugin is because the third party does not provide an email address that has already been verified. For example, if you use `Google OAuth2` to log in, the plugin will fetch the user information returned by OAuth, which will contain the field of whether the email is verified or not, that is, the `Email Verified JSON Path`. By checking this, it will determine whether the current email has been verified by Google or not. ----- _So, you have two choices._ The first is to completely trust the information provided by the third party. That means not checking the email. At this time, you need to turn off the email verification button. ----- Second, verify the email. Turn on the button and fill in the correct `Email Verified JSON Path` to find out if the email has been verified by the third party. **This assumes that you have configured the User Email JSON Path to retrieve the user's email correctly.** Finally, if you don't want users to register via email, turn off the Allow email registration button so that users can only register via OAuth. Using it this way should meet your needs, the user can login **only** via OAuth2 and there is **no need to recheck** the email after logging in.

Based on the issue #429.

Two options:

1. Keep user content and reset all profile information
2. Delete all content and reset all profile information

#!/bin/bash

title: NA
body: @hongwenYang When the project has been initialized, it will not be initialized even if the `/usr/bin/answer init` command is executed. The connection to database exception error should occur because the database was not started successfully or was not connected **before** the Answer was started. If you are deploying with docker-compose, it is recommended that you use `healthcheck` to **ensure that the database is started before you start Answer**.

@hikae  From the logs, it appears that the problem is caused by **the `user_external_login` table not existing**. The strange thing is that this table should have been created in `v1.0.5`. You can try to resolve this issue by first manually doing an upgrade in the following way.

- Start and enter the docker container: `docker exec -it answer bash` answer is your container name.
- Execute the upgrade command manually to upgrade: `answer upgrade -f v1.0.5`
- If the upgrade fails in the process, please reply to the upgrade failure log.

title: 解决重启之后重定向50x页面
body: 现象：重启服务后会重定向到50x页面 answer容器日志如下： 原因：安装完问答系统后，使用docker-compose启动，如果mysql等数据库服务还没启动，answer服务先启动了，会导致answer服务没法连接到mysql数据库，此时访问网页会一直返回50x 临时解决方案： 在docker-compose的answer服务中，用ENTRYPOINT指令强制覆盖原有容器启动命令，让容器睡60秒再启动web服务（当然，15秒应该也足够）： ``` entrypoint: sh -c "sleep 60 && /entrypoint.sh" ``` 建议开发者在启动answer容器的时候，尝试连接数据库时，可以写个循环每隔一段时间去尝试连接，也许几秒钟之后就能连接了呢（，起码别一次连接不成功应用就寄了

title: NA
body:
@LxxxSec The reason we can't do the connection retry is because **we need to know if it's a user's first post-installation startup**. If we are unable to connect to the database and keep doing retries, the first time user will not be able to enter the installation process properly(or when use want to reinstall). In general, **we believe that all middleware should be guaranteed to be up and running before the program starts**. Failure to do so may lead to other unexpected situations. Of course we will consider what you said and see if there are other ways to optimize it. Thank for your feedback.

In general, we recommend that you use `healthcheck` when deploying via docker-compose to ensure that the database is prioritized over the Answer startup. 

```yaml
version: "3.9"
services:
  meta-answer:
    image: answerdev/answer:latest
    depends_on:
      db:
        condition: service_healthy
    links:
      - db
  db:
    image: mariadb:10.4.7
    restart: always
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
    healthcheck:
      test: [ "CMD", "mysqladmin" ,"ping", "-uroot", "-proot"]
      timeout: 20s
      retries: 10
    command: ['mysqld', '--character-set-server=utf8mb4', '--collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci', '--skip-character-set-client-handshake']
```

4.Verification code has the same issue, `/answer/api/v1/user/action/record?action=password` also returns **401**

**Expected behavior**
Should be able to access forgot password page normally.

**Platform (please complete the following information):**

 - OS: Windows 11 22H2
 - Browser: Chrome 115
 - Version: v1.1.1

title: Images in the private mode can still be accessed when not logged in
body:

title: NA
body:
这里带来一个问题，如果图片存在第三方 OSS，该如何验证权限呢？

Here is a question: how to verify the permission of images if they are stored in OSS (Object Storage Service)?

title: NA
body:
参考minio和七牛云又拍云等的方案，通常是向oss服务申请一个key ，再通过303重定向到真实的带着key的资源链接实现的。
但这会带来一系列的问题，比如问题内容发布修改时的逻辑。 以及图片资源需要归档到数据库等。
具体参考文档  https://help.upyun.com/knowledge-base/cdn-token-limite/
（通常客户端会这么干 ，不知道老哥有没有什么骚操作）

Referring to solutions such as Minio and Qiniuyun Youpaiyun, it is usually achieved by applying for a key from the OSS service and redirecting it to a real resource link with the key through 303.

But this will bring a series of problems, such as the logic when publishing and modifying the problem content. And image resources need to be archived in the database.

Specific reference documents https://help.upyun.com/knowledge-base/cdn-token-limite/

title: NA
body: @AionKwong Look at the log, `net/http: invalid Cookie.Domain "192.168.1.9:40065"; dropping domain attribute`, the cause of this problem is known. This feature is dependent on the cookie to achieve, if you do not use the domain name of the security problems caused by **the cookie can not be written properly**. So the user can not access to images. If you use a domain name, you won't have this problem.

title: NA
body:

title: Edit comments of other users using role = admin is not persisted
body:
**Describe the bug**
As an admin user (role = admin) I'm able to edit comments of other users (edit link is show).
When "save edits" is pressed, the change is not persisted.

What works perfectly is editing my own comments (role = admin).

Additionally what seems (to me) to be a bit inconsistent is that I'm not offered an edit link for a comment if I have the role = user. 


**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Login as user with role = admin
2. Click on 'edit' of another user's comment
3. Apply some changes to the comment
4. Click on 'save edits'
5. Refresh the page
6. Change is gone and not shown, instead the original comment is still shown

**Expected behavior**
The changed comment should be shown after clicking on 'save edits' and refresh of the page


**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Desktop
 - OS: macOS
 - Browser Firefox 116.0.3, Chrome 116.0.5845.140

title: Automatically replace the external links of pictures in the content with those of your own website
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, whether a local markdown file or an article reprinted from other platforms, the image links inside will not be replaced with the website's own links, which may lead to the risk of image failure.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I want a function that when publishing an article, I can automatically download and upload external link-type pictures to my own website server, and automatically replace them with pictures from my own server in the article.
I also want a plug-in that can automatically scan all the external link images in my website and do the above.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Considering that when pasting a picture, it will automatically upload the picture and write the address of the picture into the content, I think this function should not be difficult to implement.

title: Creating duplicate questions by clicking repeatedly will generate multiple questions with the same title.
body: Creating duplicate questions by clicking repeatedly will generate multiple questions with the same title.

title: NA
body: @binfooo Thanks for the feedback, we'll fix this as soon as possible.

title: NA
body: I added a unique index to the database table for the "title" to address this issue.

title: NA
body:
Adding a unique index to the `title` is not a good practice for the following two reasons:
1. There is no requirement for the `title` to be unique in product design. Adding a unique index solely to prevent duplicate submissions is not a good practice.
2. Add index to long text is not a good practice as it can potentially impact insertion performance and increase database size.

I think we need to do the following:
1. Add a loading state to the submit button to prevent duplicate clicks during the HTTP request, which can also improve the interaction experience in weak network conditions.
2. Add a UUID to POST requests to filter out duplicate requests on the backend.

title: NA
body: Fixed in v1.2.0

title: License breaks helm chart
body:
**Describe the bug**
After adding the license header in https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/commit/3d2187d8491d582a41481e8a52f142e2750e500e
the helm chart doesn work anymore, because the apiversion of the serviceaccount is being mistakenly seen as a comment. 

Removing the license header, and then the chart works again. This only happens in the service account, because it is the only one that is deployed conditional depending on the values. 

https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/blob/main/charts/templates/serviceaccount.yaml

See an explanation here: 
https://github.com/argoproj/argo-helm/issues/507#issuecomment-793127686

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to the charts directory
2. run ```helm template .```

**Expected behavior**
The serviceaccount rendered correctly
![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/8955039/7f03975a-83f8-4d9b-8406-eaa0009cb874)


**Screenshots**
The serviceaccount is missing the apiversion, because it is seen as a comment
![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/8955039/ef633c6b-1a43-4564-ac4d-c6c8a0fb2e27)


**Platform (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: [e.g. Desktop, Mobile]
 - OS: [e.g. macOS]
 - Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]

title: NA
body:
Explanation can be seen here
https://github.com/helm/helm/issues/4191

Can be solved by changing
```{{- if .Values.serviceAccount.create -}}```

to
```{{ if .Values.serviceAccount.create -}}```

title: SSO only config/behavior
body:
When having AnswerDEV configured with OAuth, it still shows both, "Log In" and "Sign Up".

The login form offers a email/password login, that may be disallowed in a SSO only setup like it is usual in enterprises:
![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/40993644/dd877cfa-a4d3-45d1-bab5-53f51ee8e345)

Having user registration disallowed in the configuration, the sign up form only offers SSO:
![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/40993644/ac68fbcb-0f70-4c39-bd5f-955eb6807c18)

And finally, users still can change their password, or disconnect from the SSO provider:
![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/40993644/81ddb5db-daf5-438f-b85f-72b21c4e33e9)


It would be great, to have an option "SSO only", which only offers the SSO login (no login form, no registration form), and hides the change password and disconnect from SSO provider option on the edit profile pages.

title: NA
body: I would like to see an SSO only mode also.

body: Duplicate of #565

title: Cannot delete tags because of existing posts
body:
**Describe the bug**
This may be more of a design decision than a bug, but it seems like the questions/answer is being soft-deleted, which means that you cannot delete the tags if they where ever used on a question/answer. If this is correct, then I think it must be a mistake, that softdelete have not been implemented for the tags aswell. 

In general i think it should be possible for an administrator to delete / modify tags created by the community. I suggest to be able to delete a tag, even if it is used on an active post. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Create a question with a new tag that havent been used before
2. Delete the question
3. Delete the new tag

**Expected behavior**
The tag should show as being used on 0 questions and you would be able to delete the tag

**Actual behavior**
The tag is shown as being used on 1 questions, and you cannot delete the tag.

Here is the json string for my avatar

{"type":"custom","gravatar":"https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/f449a0ac712b2575a9481318e96963b3","custom":"https://answer.salecto.io/uploads/avatar/4ZkqaeTV6gf.jpeg"}

I have replaced the string in the db with this, and now my user is able to log on without error again
{"type":"custom","gravatar":"","custom":""}

I expect that the reason for this, is that I have first setup gravatar, then uploaded an image, and then the oauth tries to also add a profile image, which probably results in the json exceeding 255 characters. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Setup gravatar
2. Upload image instead
3. Setup oauth
3. Login with the user using oauth
4. See error in the console

**Expected behavior**
NIL

 - OS: [e.g. macOS]
 - Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]

title: more options for email notifications

1. 现在的邮件通知方式是新帖子全员通知，会造成一瞬间发送大量email的情况，邮件服务商似乎没法全部成功处理，是否可以增加一个每封邮件之间的发送间隔的设置
2. 提问回复可以立即发送邮件通知，这个没问题。新帖子和关注标签，是否可以改成一天发送一次

title: mysql connection database failed
body:
The image I am using is answerdev/answer:1.2.0, with a MySQL database. Everything works fine except when the server is restarted, I encounter the following error: "Connection to the database failed: dial tcp 172.18.0.2:3306: connect: connection refused." However, the container starts running normally immediately after restarting it.

config.yaml
```
debug: false
server:
  http:
    addr: 0.0.0.0:80
data:
  database:
    driver: mysql
    connection: answer:test123@tcp(mysql:3306)/answer
  cache:
    file_path: /data/cache/cache.db
i18n:
  bundle_dir: /data/i18n
service_config:
  upload_path: /data/uploads
swaggerui:
  show: false
  protocol: http
  host: 127.0.0.1
  address: :80
```

title: NA

title: NA
body:
I have identified the issue. Due to the `mysql` server restarting under certain circumstances, after the connection between the `answer` service and the database is interrupted, it will not attempt to reconnect to the database. Therefore, even after my `mysql` server has completed the restart, accessing the answer service still results in the error "HTTP Error 50X The server encountered an error and could not complete your request." 

The issue differs from #472 as the error does not manifest at the start of the service. However, the underlying logic error seems similar. To maintain service availability, it is essential to implement a reconnection operation to address potential database disconnections (e.g. the network connection interruption) during service running.

title: NA
body: Update: Following my tests, the issue has been addressed in version 1.3.5. Now, after rebooting `MySQL`, the `answer` is able to reestablish a connection with the database."

title: Restrict: users can only write one answer to the same question
body:
## Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Answer is a Q&A platform, not a forum. Some users mistake the answer section for a discussion area. Despite receiving prompts to edit their original answers, they keep adding new answers, breaking down the answer into several separate responses, making it difficult to accept the correct answer.

![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/360618/c7097885-c97e-432b-aef2-80eedb46ec0d)

## Describe the solution you'd like

By default, users can only write one answer to the same question.

1. Add switch option in `admin -> settings -> write`, default is "On".
   
   ![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/360618/a83dc71f-80d7-4f99-b3f1-1e258bb9369d)

2. When the user has answered the current question (excluding deleted ones):
   - Show “Edit my existing answer” which takes the user to the page where they can edit their answer.
   - When allowing multiple answers from the same user, display another button “Add another answer”. Clicking on it will prompt a dialog box as before.
   
   ![image](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/360618/15176349-7895-4247-99f6-1bead5e7d76f)

Design files: [Answer](https://www.figma.com/file/MeOkbCEQS9jCDRVHcjTRtY/Answer-Core?type=design&node-id=19502%3A2581&mode=design&t=dxM16BHTbgn9TWKy-1), [Settings](https://www.figma.com/file/MeOkbCEQS9jCDRVHcjTRtY/Answer-Core?type=design&node-id=5085%3A4607&mode=design&t=dxM16BHTbgn9TWKy-1)

**Describe the bug**
Changed the default port 9080 to 9081, using nginx reverse proxy, nginx gets a 502 error. 
Nginx and answer configuration files have changed the port to 9081.
Curl 127.0.0.1:9081 can show website content.

title: NA
body: @Liamn0244 Upon using the curl command, it is confirmed that the website is running. Can you please share your Nginx configuration to identify if there are any issues with it?

title: NA
body: ![WX20231122-140124](https://github.com/apache/incubator-answer/assets/135837370/48173354-602b-4343-a8ac-75ef4cfd3aa7)

title: NA
body:
@Liamn0244 The NGINX configuration looks fine. So, I have the following troubleshooting suggestions. HTH.
1. Check the `nginx` logs for errors.
2. Turn off the CDN and see what errors occur when accessing it by default.
3. Check if the error is caused by http redirection to https.
4. If none of the above can help you. Make other conditions stay the same, only change the port back to 9080 to see if it's a port issue.

body: If I change the port from 9081 to 9080 the site will work fine. Nginx log:
